trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script: -- println("Region 3 map 2: Initialised") SetVar("ThingStatus",0) CreateVehicleEx("ArcadeScout01","PlayerScout",CVector(getPos("ScoutPos_loc"))) local veh=GetEntityByName("PlayerScout") if veh then veh:SetSkin(6) veh:setGodMode(1) end SetVar("GarVehName","PlayerScout") SetVar("MaxWalkHuman",5) SetVar("FirstVehChange", 0) --AAAAAAA -- TakeQuest("r3m1_GoToOracle") -- TakeQuest("r3m1_FindNative_2") -- CompleteQuest("r3m1_FindNative_2") --AAAAAAAA trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trEnterTo_r3m2
trigger.script:
-- println("Enter to r3m2") if QuestStatus("r3m1_GoToOracle")==Q_TAKEN then
local ortm = TeamCreate("OracleDefenders",1069,CVector(getPos("OracleDefendSpawn_loc")),{"Cruiser01","Hunter01"})
-- println("trOracleDefendersDie - Ativate") TActivate("trOracleDefendersDie") -- println("trOracleDefendersDie - Activate OK")
-- println(1) if ortm then -- println(2) AddVehicleGunsWithRandomAffix(ortm:GetVehicle(0), "elephant01", 3, 8+random(2)) ortm:GetVehicle(0):AddItemsToRepository("cooling_system_energy_and_firing_rate_energy", 1) ortm:GetVehicle(1):AddItemsToRepository("oil", 2)
end -- println(3) for i=0,1 do local veh = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_"..i) if veh then -- println(4) veh:SetExternalPathByName("OracleDef"..(i+1).."_1") veh:setGodMode(1) veh:setImmortalMode(1) end end end -- println(5) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trOrDefBeginEnemy
trigger.script: PlayCustomMusic("Passage04") SetTolerance(1100, 1021, RS_ENEMY) SetTolerance(1100, 1069, RS_ENEMY) for i=0,1 do -- println(" i = "..i) local veh = getObj("OracleDefenders_vehicle_"..i) if veh then -- println("OracleDefenders_vehicle_"..i) veh:setGodMode(0) veh:setImmortalMode(0) end end FailQuestIfTaken("r3m2_OvercomeOracleGuard") TakeQuest("r3m2_DestroyOracleGuard") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trOracleDefendersDie
trigger.script: -- println("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA") CompleteQuestIfTaken("r3m2_OvercomeOracleGuard") CompleteQuestIfTaken("r3m2_DestroyOracleGuard") TDeactivate("trBigMonsterDie") FailQuestIfTaken("r3m2_MonterHead") StopPlayingCustomMusic() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trNearMonster
trigger.script: TActivate("cinNearMonster") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBigMonsterDie
trigger.script: -- println("run trBigMonsterDie") if QuestStatus("r3m2_MonterHead")==Q_TAKEN then setPos("Monster_loc", CVector(1263.064, 295.702, 2822.606)) -- println("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA") -- CompleteQuestIfTaken("r3m2_MonterHead") TActivate("cinMonsterDie") AddQuestItem("quest_monster_head") else FailQuest("r3m2_MonterHead") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trWentToFactory
trigger.script:
-- println("run trWentToFactory") CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_Factory") TActivate("cinWentToFactory")
local randompos = random(3) if randompos == 1 then local art1 = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "artefact1", "or_artefact1", -1, -1, CVector(3238.540, 257.977, 3167.584), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 1) local art2 = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "artefact2", "or_artefact2", -1, -1, CVector(3170.026, 260.000, 3538.743), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0.35) TActivate("trGetThing1") TActivate("trGetThing2") elseif randompos == 2 then local art1 = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "artefact1", "or_artefact1", -1, -1, CVector(2939.223, 258.954, 3048.673), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 1) local art2 = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "artefact2", "or_artefact2", -1, -1, CVector(3215.736, 258.944, 3469.136), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0.35) TActivate("trGetThing1_1") TActivate("trGetThing2_1") elseif randompos == 3 then local art1 = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "artefact1", "or_artefact1", -1, -1, CVector(3252.539, 258.949, 2874.196), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 1) local art2 = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "artefact2", "or_artefact2", -1, -1, CVector(3114.898, 258.954, 3514.193), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 0.35) TActivate("trGetThing1_2") TActivate("trGetThing2_2") end
TeamCreate("EnemyDefenders",1002,CVector(3192.207, 259.943, 3074.804),{"Cruiser01","Hunter01","r2m1_scout03","BelazShot","Ural00"}) TActivate("DistPlayerAndEnemy") TActivate("Enemy1InfPass") TActivate("Enemy2InfPass") TActivate("Enemy3InfPass") TActivate("Enemy4InfPass") TActivate("Enemy5InfPass") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3192.207, 259.943, 3074.804)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetRotation(Quaternion(0.015, 0.490, -0.012, 0.872)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef1") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3169.219, 259.996, 2905.628)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.002, 0.477, -0.004, -0.879)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef2") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3039.022, 260.277, 3511.205)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.059, 0.896, 0.026, -0.440)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef3") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3176.929, 260.622, 2854.330)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.033, -0.995, -0.061, -0.074)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef4") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(3274.433, 260.068, 3443.652)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.002, 0.536, -0.008, 0.844)) getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef5") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: Enemy1InfPass
trigger.script: getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef1")

trigger.Name: Enemy2InfPass
trigger.script: getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef2")

trigger.Name: Enemy3InfPass
trigger.script: getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef3")

trigger.Name: Enemy4InfPass
trigger.script: getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef4")

trigger.Name: Enemy5InfPass
trigger.script: getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("PathEnemyDef5")

trigger.Name: DistPlayerAndEnemy
trigger.script:
local def1 = GetEntityByName("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0") local pl = GetPlayerVehicle() local dist1
if def1 and def1:IsAlive() then dist1 = Dist(pl, def1) if (50 > dist1) then TDeactivate("Enemy1InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy2InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy3InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy4InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy5InfPass") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("") trigger:Deactivate() end end
local dist2 local def2 = GetEntityByName("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1")
if def2 and def2:IsAlive() then dist2 = Dist(pl, def2) if (50 > dist2) then TDeactivate("Enemy1InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy2InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy3InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy4InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy5InfPass") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("") trigger:Deactivate() end end
local dist3 local def3 = GetEntityByName("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2")
if def3 and def3:IsAlive() then dist3 = Dist(pl, def3) if (50 > dist3) then TDeactivate("Enemy1InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy2InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy3InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy4InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy5InfPass") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("") trigger:Deactivate() end end
local dist4 local def4 = GetEntityByName("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3")
if def4 and def4:IsAlive() then dist4 = Dist(pl, def4) if (50 > dist4) then TDeactivate("Enemy1InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy2InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy3InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy4InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy5InfPass") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("") trigger:Deactivate() end end
local dist5 local def5 = GetEntityByName("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4")
if def5 and def5:IsAlive() then dist5 = Dist(pl, def5) if (50 > dist5) then TDeactivate("Enemy1InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy2InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy3InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy4InfPass") TDeactivate("Enemy5InfPass") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_0"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_1"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_2"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_3"):SetExternalPathByName("") getObj("EnemyDefenders_vehicle_4"):SetExternalPathByName("") trigger:Deactivate() end end

trigger.Name: trGetThing1
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 5*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 5, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
local CurStat=GetVar("ThingStatus").AsInt AddCinematicMessage( 1004, 0.25 ) AddQuestItem("quest_magic_thing1")
local art = getObj("or_artefact1") if art then art:Remove() end
if CurStat==1 then AddCinematicMessage( 1006, 0.25 ) SetVar("ThingStatus",2) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing_2") else AddCinematicMessage( 1005, 0.25 ) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing") SetVar("ThingStatus",1) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trGetThing2
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 5*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 5, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
local CurStat=GetVar("ThingStatus").AsInt AddQuestItem("quest_magic_thing2") local art = getObj("or_artefact2") if art then art:Remove() end AddCinematicMessage( 1004, 0.25 ) if CurStat==1 then AddCinematicMessage( 1006, 0.25 ) SetVar("ThingStatus",2) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing_2") else AddCinematicMessage( 1005, 0.25 ) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing") SetVar("ThingStatus",1) end trigger:Deactivate()

PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 5*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 5, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
local CurStat=GetVar("ThingStatus").AsInt AddCinematicMessage( 1004, 0.25 ) AddQuestItem("quest_magic_thing1")
local art = getObj("or_artefact1") if art then art:Remove() end
if CurStat==1 then AddCinematicMessage( 1006, 0.25 ) SetVar("ThingStatus",2) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing_2") else AddCinematicMessage( 1005, 0.25 ) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing") SetVar("ThingStatus",1) end trigger:Deactivate()

PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 5*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 5, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
local CurStat=GetVar("ThingStatus").AsInt AddQuestItem("quest_magic_thing2") local art = getObj("or_artefact2") if art then art:Remove() end AddCinematicMessage( 1004, 0.25 ) if CurStat==1 then AddCinematicMessage( 1006, 0.25 ) SetVar("ThingStatus",2) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing_2") else AddCinematicMessage( 1005, 0.25 ) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing") SetVar("ThingStatus",1) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 5*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 5, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
local CurStat=GetVar("ThingStatus").AsInt AddCinematicMessage( 1004, 0.25 ) AddQuestItem("quest_magic_thing1")
local art = getObj("or_artefact1") if art then art:Remove() end
if CurStat==1 then AddCinematicMessage( 1006, 0.25 ) SetVar("ThingStatus",2) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing_2") else AddCinematicMessage( 1005, 0.25 ) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing") SetVar("ThingStatus",1) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trGetThing2_2
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("IntenseDialogue03") TActivate("cinStopMusik_End")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 5*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 5, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
local CurStat=GetVar("ThingStatus").AsInt AddQuestItem("quest_magic_thing2") local art = getObj("or_artefact2") if art then art:Remove() end AddCinematicMessage( 1004, 0.25 ) if CurStat==1 then AddCinematicMessage( 1006, 0.25 ) SetVar("ThingStatus",2) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing_2") else AddCinematicMessage( 1005, 0.25 ) CompleteQuest("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_FindThing") SetVar("ThingStatus",1) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK1
trigger.script:
CompleteQuest("r3m2_OracleMemory_1") RemoveQuestItem( "quest_repair_robot1" );
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("VK1_path", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 6, 1,1) StartCinematic() AddCinematicMessage( 1, 0.25 )
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 )
TActivate("trVK1_Fade") TActivate("trVK_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK1_Fade
trigger.script:
CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_PS_ORACUL_MAIN4", "eff1", -1, -1, CVector(1913.9, 302.51, 3152), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 0.64)
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(1833.376, 288.552, 3148.688)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.007, 0.699, 0.004, 0.715)) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK_End
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK2
trigger.script:
CompleteQuest("r3m2_OracleMemory_2") RemoveQuestItem( "quest_repair_robot2" )
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("VK2_path", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 6, 1,1) StartCinematic() AddCinematicMessage( 2, 0.25 )
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 )
TActivate("trVK2_Fade") TActivate("trVK_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK2_Fade
trigger.script:
CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_PS_ORACUL_MAIN4", "eff2", -1, -1, CVector(681.7, 289, 1944), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 0.64)
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(690.340, 269.296, 1851.323)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.058, -0.007, -0.009, -0.998)) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK3
trigger.script:
CompleteQuest("r3m2_OracleMemory_3") RemoveQuestItem( "quest_repair_robot3" )
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
Fly("VK3_path", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 6, 1,1) StartCinematic() AddCinematicMessage( 3, 0.25 )
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 )
TActivate("trVK3_Fade") TActivate("trVK_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trVK3_Fade
trigger.script:
CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_PS_ORACUL_MAIN4", "eff3", -1, -1, CVector(1214.700, 322.100, 1255.800), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 0.64)
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(1196.619, 303.181, 1185.095)) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.004, -0.229, -0.011, -0.973)) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExcahgeVehFirst
trigger.script: -- println("trExcahgeVehFirst") if QuestStatus("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_Return")==Q_TAKEN then trigger:Deactivate() else TActivate("cinExchangeVehFirst") trigger:Deactivate() end -- TActivate()

trigger.Name: trExcahgeVeh
trigger.script: -- println("trExcahgeVeh") if GetPlayerVehicle() then GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("PlCarPos_loc"))) end TActivate("trExcahgeVehAction") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExcahgeVehAction
trigger.script:
-- println("trExcahgeVehAction") local excarname=GetVar("GarVehName").AsString -- println(excarname) local oldcarname=GetPlayerVehicle():GetName() if oldcarname==nil then oldcarname="OldCarPlayer"..random(1000) GetPlayerVehicle():SetNameFromScript( oldcarname ) end if excarname=="PlayerScout" then SaveWeaponGroups() end -- println(oldcarname) local veh=getObj(excarname) -- local oldveh=getObj(oldcarname) local oldveh=GetPlayerVehicle() -- LOG(1) if veh then --function FlyLinked( PathName, Id, PlayTime, StartFade, EndFade, LookToId, VisPanel, RelativeRotations, -- println("AAAAAAAAAAAAAA") TActivate("cinExcahgeVehAction_End") SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) FlyLinked( "Garage_Path", veh:GetId(), 6, 0, 0, veh:GetId(), nil, nil) Fly("Garage_Path2", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 5, 0,0) StartCinematic() if excarname=="PlayerScout" and GetVar("FirstVehChange").AsInt == 0 then AddCinematicMessage( 10, 2 ) SetVar("FirstVehChange", 1) end -- LOG(2) GetPlayerVehicle():setGodMode(1) GetPlayerVehicle():setImmortalMode(1) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomControlEnabled(1) -- LOG(3) CapturePlayerVehicle(0, "garage") -- LOG(4) g_Player:AddChild(veh) GetPlayerVehicle():setGodMode(0) GetPlayerVehicle():setImmortalMode(0) GetPlayerVehicle():AddModifier("hp", "+ 1") GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomControlEnabled(0) veh:SetExternalPathByName("ExitToGaragePath") local vehtype=GetPlayerVehicle():GetProperty("Prototype").AsString if vehtype=="ArcadeScout01" then GetPlayerVehicle():AddModifier("fuel","+ 300") end end if oldveh then -- LOG(4) -- oldveh:SetExternalPathByName("EnterToGaragePath") -- oldveh:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("PlCarPos_loc"))) oldveh:setGodMode(1) oldveh:setImmortalMode(1) end if oldcarname=="PlayerScout" then RestoreWeaponGroups() end
-- LOG(5) SetVar("GarVehName",oldcarname) TActivate("trExcahgeVehSwitchOn") -- LOG(6) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExcahgeVehSwitchOn
trigger.script:
TDeactivate("cinExcahgeVehAction_End") -- println("trExcahgeVehSwitchOn") if QuestStatus("r3m2_TwoMagicThing_Return")==Q_TAKEN and GetPlayerVehicle():GetProperty("Prototype").AsString~="ArcadeScout01" then trigger:Deactivate() else TActivate("trExcahgeVeh") end
local name = GetVar("GarVehName").AsString local veh = getObj(name) if veh then veh:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("ScoutPos_loc"))) veh:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.007, -0.458, 0.004, 0.889)) end
-- trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trPlTurnRoundFactory
trigger.script: local vehtype=GetPlayerVehicle():GetProperty("Prototype").AsString -- println("trPlTurnRoundFactory "..vehtype) if QuestStatus("r3m2_TwoMagicThing")==Q_TAKEN and vehtype=="ArcadeScout01" then return else -- FlyLinked("factoryGoAway", GetPlayerVehicleId(), 10, 1, 1) TActivate("cinPlTurnRoundFactory_FadeIn") TActivate("cinPlTurnRoundFactory_PathStart") TActivate("cinPlTurnRoundFactory_End") SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) Fly("WentFactory_TurnAround", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 6, 1,0) Fly("WentFactory_TurnAround2", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, nil, 5, 0,1) StartCinematic() if QuestStatus("r3m2_TwoMagicThing")~=Q_TAKEN then AddCinematicMessage(11, 0.25) else TActivate("trExcahgeVehFirst") TActivate("trPlLeaveFactyOnScout") TActivate("cinWentFactory_Path2") AddCinematicMessage(6, 0.25) end end

trigger.Name: trPlLeaveFactyOnScout
trigger.script: -- println("MAMAAA") -- LOG("MAMAAA") local vehtype=GetPlayerVehicle():GetProperty("Prototype").AsString -- println(vehtype) if vehtype=="ArcadeScout01" then SpawnMessageBox( "17" ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) setPos(GetPlayerVehicle(), CVector(getPos("EnterToGarage_loc"))) -- GetPlayerVehicle():SetPositionOnGround(getPos("EnterToGarage_loc")) end -- trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trSignPlace
trigger.script:
--================================================= if GetPlayerVehicle() then GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) end
TActivate("cinPoleFirst") CompleteQuest("q_PWS1")
--================================================= trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExitToR3M1
trigger.script:
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" )
if b == 1 then -- println ("Yes") -- GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("ExitMapPath") -- TActivate("cinExit31OkFirst") PassToMap("r3m1", "FromR3M2", -1 ) -- PassToMap("r3m1", "FromR3M2", 110 , true) else -- println ("No") TActivate("cinExit31ReturnFirst") -- GetPlayerVehicle():SetExternalPathByName("ReturnPath") end

trigger.Name: trStartHumans
trigger.script: -- local maxhum = GetVar("MaxWalkHuman").AsInt -- if maxhum then -- for i=1,maxhum do -- local tr = getObj("trHumanDie") -- if tr then -- tr:AddEvent("GE_OBJECT_DIE", "WalkerHuman"..i ) -- end -- end -- end TActivate("trCreateHumans") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trCreateHumans
trigger.script: local maxhum = GetVar("MaxWalkHuman").AsInt if maxhum then for i=1,maxhum do local hum = getObj("WalkerHuman"..i) if not hum then local hummodlist = {"Human","Human2","Human3"} local newhum = CreateHuman( hummodlist[random(3)], 1001, CVector(getPos("SpawnHuman"..i.."_loc")), "WalkerHuman"..i, "Human"..i.."_Path") if newhum then newhum:SetSkin(random(2)) end end end --TActivate("trHumanDie") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trHumanDie
trigger.script: TActivate("trCreateHumans") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trWentOracleDefenders
trigger.script: GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) if (CanQuestBeGiven("r3m2_OvercomeOracleGuard") and QuestStatus("r3m1_GoToOracle")==Q_TAKEN) or (QuestStatus("r3m2_OvercomeOracleGuard")==Q_TAKEN) then TActivate("cinWentOracleDef") elseif QuestStatus("r3m2_OvercomeOracleGuard")==Q_COMPLETED then trigger:Deactivate() else TActivate("cinPlCantGoOracle") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trPlaceSecret
trigger.script:
local i=1 local gunlist = {"hornet01","specter01","pkt01","kord01","storm01","fagot01","maxim01","vector01","vulcan01","kpvt01","rapier01","flag01","rainmetal01","elephant01","odin01","omega01","bumblebee01","hammer01","hunterSideGun","mrakSideGun","big_swingfire01","cyclops01","octopus01","hailSideGun","hurricane01","rocketLauncher","zeusSideGun","marsSideGun"} local len = getn(gunlist)
while getObj("SecretPlace"..i.."_loc")~=nil do -- println(i) CreateBoxWithAffixGun(CVector(getPos("SecretPlace"..i.."_loc")), gunlist[exrandom(len)], random(0, 2)) i = i + 1 end
trigger:Deactivate()
